specify.reviewerNotes: Spec-reviewer approved at iteration 3/5. Phase-reviewer reached iteration cap (5/5) with 1 remaining warning about workflow-artifacts index page missing AC — addressed in final edit before commit.

create-plan.reviewerNotes: Plan-reviewer approved at iteration 1/5. Phase-reviewer reached cap (5/5) with 2 remaining warnings about verification completeness (tier_status/project_type in Step 3, rollback pre-condition in Step 7) — both addressed post-cap.

phaseReview.reviewerNotes: Phase-reviewer cap reached. Final warnings (verification field completeness, rollback pre-condition) were fixed post-cap. All blocker-level issues resolved across 5 iterations.
